mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PRFS_NUM) as count, DEPT_NM, DEPT_NUM FROM PROFESSOR, DEPARTMENT WHERE PRFS_DEPT = DEPT_NUM GROUP BY DEPT_NUM, DEPT_NM ORDER BY DEPT_NUM
SELECT COUNT(STUD_NUM)as count,DEPT_NM,DEPT_NUM FROM STUDENT,DEPARTMENT WHERE STUD_SCHREG_CODE='휴학' AND STUD_DEPT = DEPT_NUM group by DEPT_NM,DEPT_NUM order by DEPT_NUM
SELECT COUNT(STUD_NUM) as count,DEPT_NM,DEPT_NUM FROM STUDENT,DEPARTMENT WHERE STUD_SCHREG_CODE='자퇴' AND STUDENT.STUD_DEPT = DEPARTMENT.DEPT_NUM GROUP BY DEPT_NUM,DEPT_NM ORDER BY DEPT_NUM

SELECT COUNT(STUD_NUM)as count,DEPT_NM,DEPT_NUM FROM STUDENT,DEPARTMENT,RTS WHERE STUDENT.STUD_SCHREG_CODE='복학' AND STUDENT.STUD_DEPT =DEPARTMENT.DEPT_NUM AND STUD_NUM = RTS.RTS_STUD AND RTS_DATE LIKE '17%' GROUP BY DEPT_NUM,DEPT_NM ORDER BY DEPT_NUM
